title: Morning Minute: Crypto Caught in Middle of Democrat vs Republican Battle
contentSnippet: It's getting heated in DC, and the crypto industry is stuck in the middle—perhaps a sign of what's to come as it becomes more politicized.

title: Ledger's Latest Nano Crypto Hardware Wallet Offers a Punch of Personality
contentSnippet: The Ledger Nano Gen5 is totally redesigned and features exclusive badges from legendary Apple icon designer, Susan Kare.

title: Ledger launches next-gen Nano device and Wallet app to strengthen digital asset and identity security in the AI era
contentSnippet: The updates expand Ledger's focus from digital asset storage to broader identity and security applications.

title: Ledger Unveils $179 Nano Gen5, Built for Identity in an AI-Driven World
contentSnippet: Alongside, there's the Ledger Wallet, a reimagined version of the company's Ledger Live app, and Ledger Enterprise Multisig, a new platform for institutional asset management.

title: Crypto Market Maker B2C2 Launches PENNY to Enable Instant, Zero-Fee Stablecoin Swaps
contentSnippet: The institutional liquidity provider’s new platform says it will let users exchange stablecoins like USDT and USDC across multiple blockchains without fees.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin, Ether Edge Higher; HyperLiquid Surges on $1B Purchase Plan
contentSnippet: After weeks of turbulence, the crypto market found support Thursday, with Bitcoin and Ether posting modest gains and HyperLiquid’s token HYPE soaring.

title: WazirX to Resume Trading and Withdrawals More Than a Year After $234M Hack
contentSnippet: The platform will restart operations with a phased approach and new BitGo custody partnership following court-sanctioned restructuring.

title: Bitcoin ‘tests patience’ below $110,000 as options open interest climbs: analysts
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has stayed rangebound under $110,000 as options open interest neared records and ETF outflows deepen ahead of U.S. inflation data.

title: Risk Proxies Challenge Bitcoin's Bounce; HYPE, XMR Shine: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 23, 2025

title: Ethereum Whale Scoops Up $32M in ETH as Bitcoin, Solana Whales Cash Out
contentSnippet: The Ethereum whale buy signals institutional interest, analysts said, while a Solana whale dumped $93M, showing a shift in market preference.

title: Revolut Secures MiCA License in Cyprus, Expanding Regulated Crypto Services Across EU
contentSnippet: Fintech giant gains CySEC approval to offer compliant crypto trading across 30 EEA markets under MiCA

title: Polymarket Seeks Investment at Valuation of $12B-$15B: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: That level would mark a more than 10-fold increase since June, when Polymarket raised $200 million at a $1 billion valuation.

title: Decentralized Exchange Bunni Pulls the Plug Following $8.4M Flash Loan Exploit
contentSnippet: The DEX lacks capital for a secure relaunch that would cost six to seven figures in audits alone, following the September hack.

title: Crypto Exchange KuCoin Launches Mining Pool for Dogecoin, Litecoin and Soon Bitcoin
contentSnippet: KuCoin has created a new mining pool service called KuPool, which includes support for Dogecoin, Litecoin, and eventually Bitcoin too.

title: Bunni DEX Shuts Down, Cites Recovery Costs After $8.4M Exploit
contentSnippet: The team cannot afford the cost of relaunching the protocol, which would require significant investment in audits and development.

title: Polymarket eyes fresh funding at up to $15 billion valuation amid surging prediction market interest: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Prediction markets hype has already seen Polymarket rise from a $1 billion valuation in June to around $9 billion earlier this month.

title: Class action lawsuit claims Ben Chow orchestrated Melania, LIBRA memecoin fraud
contentSnippet: A class action lawsuit claimed that Melania Trump and Argentine President Javier Milei were used as 'window dressing' in the alleged fraud.

title: Reddit Sues Perplexity AI, Alleging ‘Industrial-Scale’ Data Theft
contentSnippet: The social platform accused Perplexity and its data partners of unlawfully harvesting user content to train AI systems.

title: Quantum Solutions Adds 2K ETH to Become 11th-Largest Ether Treasury Company
contentSnippet: Quantum Solutions boosts ETH position as company cements standing among top digital asset treasuries, become No. 2 DAT outside U.S.

title: WazirX to resume trading on Friday, ending 16-month suspension from hack
contentSnippet: Last week, the Singapore High Court approved WazirX's restructuring plan, which received approval from 95.7% of participating creditors.

title: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest buys $21 million worth of Robinhood shares
contentSnippet: Ark Invest has been increasing investment in crypto stocks, acquiring shares in Robinhood, Bullish, Coinbase and ETH treasury firm BitMine.

title: Canada’s Anti-Money Laundering Watchdog Levies Record $126M Fine on Cryptomus
contentSnippet: Fintrac said the firm was fined for unreported activity including transactions tied to child sexual abuse material, fraud, ransomware payments and sanctions evasion.

title: BTC, XRP, SOL, ADA Hold Flat as Google’s Quantum Breakthrough Rekindles Old Crypto Fears

title: Paxos Co-Founder Calls 'Transparency' a Silver Lining Following $300T Stablecoin Snafu
contentSnippet: The Paxos CEO attempted to reframe the minting incident as validation of blockchain technology's transparency benefits.

title: Legacy asset manager T. Rowe Price files for its first crypto ETF
contentSnippet: The $1.77 trillion asset manager seeks to launch a crypto ETF that invests in bitcoin, ether, Solana, and other cryptocurrencies.

title: Hyperliquid Token Defies Bitcoin Slump as Wall Street Fund Moves In

title: Hyperliquid Strategies seeks $1 billion raise to expand HYPE treasury

title: Exploring TON Strategy’s $558 million treasury company with Exec. Chairman Manuel Stotz

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest

title: FIFA’s blockchain-based tickets face scrutiny from Swiss gambling regulator
